com.samsung.android.sdk.health.sensor

Interface ShealthDeviceFinder.ScanListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ShealthDeviceFinder

    public static interface ShealthDeviceFinder.ScanListener
    This listener interface receives scan status events.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR_CANCELLED
      Scan is stopped.
      static int ERROR_IN_PROGRESS
      Scan is already in progress
      static int ERROR_NONE
      No error
      static int ERROR_SENSOR_NOT_READY
      Specified sensor is not ready
      static int MAXIMUM_DURATION
      Maximum duration of scan in seconds
      static int MINIMUM_DURATION
      Minimum duration of the scan in seconds.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDeviceFound(ShealthSensorDevice device)
      Called when a matching device is found during the scan.
      void onStarted(int error)
      Called when a scan is started.
      void onStopped(int error)
      Called when a scan is completed.

    • Method Detail

      • onDeviceFound

        void onDeviceFound(ShealthSensorDevice device)
        Called when a matching device is found during the scan.
        Parameters:
        device - : Sensor device which can be used to communicate further

      • onStarted

        void onStarted(int error)
        Called when a scan is started.
        Parameters:
        error - : Any error happened during scan ex) ERROR_NONE, ERROR_CANCELLED, etc

      • onStopped

        void onStopped(int error)
        Called when a scan is completed.
        Parameters:
        error - : Any error happened during scan ex) ERROR_NONE, ERROR_CANCELLED, etc
